This tab contains a list of absolute paths of images external to project. If images of this type are used in the contents it is necessary to define their paths in this step to allow Document Composition to include the images in the spool.

## Accessing the configuration of images external to project
The **External project image library **tab allows to access and configure external images to be used in the project.

![](data:image/png;base64,)

## Entering image paths
Change the contents of the list by adding or removing external image paths.

> Warning

Paths must be absolute and must consider the operating system which hosts the print spool generation phase
